scripts.watch-css: postcss assets/src/css/style.css -o assets/dist/css/style.css --watch & postcss assets/src/css/editor.css -o assets/dist/css/editor.css --watch
scripts.build-css: postcss assets/src/css/style.css -o assets/dist/css/style.css && postcss assets/src/css/editor.css -o assets/dist/css/editor.css
scripts.dev: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.prod: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
